channel.title: [508] SunScape v1.31 - Final Release
channel.description:
[center][b]NOTE! This is originally posted by Sunny++ at R-S Me myself has no association to this source at all.[/b] Hello, and this is my last release to SunScape 508 i have done a lot in this project and im releasing so i can start working on a 562 which i'll probably be my final project and carry that one on. I love the features of the 562 its perfect so yeah. Server was made by Zach Freesunfury/Sunny++ same person. and other credits i left in server. If you feel i left you out of the credits post back i'll put you on here. Server base - Z508 Download Link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wmizjekab0o Features Basic Censoring System, in my new server it will definitely change. Trade flawless no trade limit i never wanted one in SunScape Chisel on Boxsets a lot of them I have cleaned the code should look somewhat clean. Not all of it. Stat menus Perfect All dups fixed. Teletabs all work Purple Sweets Perfect Flood Protection All Bank Booths work correctly + G.E Collect Ring of Stone Dual LD + HD Multiway combat with interfaces just need 1 more fix not added but codes in there. Anti flooding just need to test it more. Friends List + Ignores just need them to save the names near Perfect banking has notes and everything else , just need tabs. Pickpocketing/Thieving just need failing. Wilderness ditch + interface just small jumping bug. Level up messages changed Z508's just need skill icons. PVNPC Combat much better than Z508's Players cannot use "MOD" "ADMIN" or "OWNER" in there name. Or Invalid characters. The server is very stable, can hold a decent amount of players. I can't remember every single feature i had but heres my update log.
/* * @Author - Freesunfury/Sunny++ * @title - SunScape * @Version - 1.31 */ ~ June 23, 2009 ~ 100% - Way to sell items besides G.E :ellitem # 99% - Ring Of Stone Just need to stop player from moving while using ring 95% - Easter Ring just need Interface and stopping player from moving ~ June 24, 2009 ~ 100% - I do believe all banking locations work on Objects not npcs yet. 100% - Changed text + startup. 100% - Edgeville Banker 100% - New way to read unhandled objects and interfaces, instead of + using misc it goes in the admins chat box 99% - Censoring System, just need a log for it and its 100% 99% - Bounty Hunter Banker first click doens't work, need to make bh safezone. 99% - New way to stop players from having Admin, Mod, Owner in there name. + still can be improved. 95% - Censor System almost complete just need to enable it. 95% - Yell Added with monitor, someday will have delay and logs. 90% - Map Added disabled for now untill fix the button click. ~ June 25, 2009 ~ 100% - Going over the Game Engine. 100% - Trading "X", and "All" Work 100% - rewrote, the Game Engine Packaging. 100% - Reduced file size by getting rid of packages. 97% - Overall trading % not much missing. ~ June 26, 2009 ~ 100% - 5 Npcs Loaded at home 100% - Command Clean Coded 100% - Commands have been changed + Added a few more. 100% - Very Steady Economy Great for PK/PVP 25% - Theifing just needs to give theif xp, and delay then just need failing, which i might not add. ~ June 27, 2009 ~ 100% - Empty Command - (Clears Inventory items) 100% - Addxp method, can now addxp to skills 100% - Lowered all Defender kill counts it was way to high 100% - New and Improved Wilderness Ditch, Interface + Plays Sound 100% - Magic Teletabs Flawless Gfx, cannot tele while teleblocked nor >= 20 wilderness 99% - Added All Teleport tabs into price list i'll change prices in future 95% - Level Up Messages just need skill icon + click menu. ~ - Magic Short bow Special Maxhit + Accuracy Increased due to low hits ~ - Name on bank added ~ - Dragon Claw's have been powered up, first 2 hits = highest 3,4th hits are 50% less power than 1 + 2 hits ~ June 28, 2009 ~ 100% - Way to get items from Box sets using chisel (finished) 100% - Third Age Box Sets (finished) 100% - Barrows Box sets (finished) 100% - Dragon sets (finished) 100% - Rune Armour Sets (finished) 100% - Gilded Box Sets (finished) 100% - Bank Dups, Dc Bugs, and all bugs cleared/fixed 100% - Even Better Economy due to near 100% Trade. 99% - Trading near Flawless No Dups just need 'Remove All', and how much your trader has for inventory + Space left, may become very useful. 95% - Banking Just need Tabs, and Noteable items other than that flawless ~ - Working on a new method of 'Economy' because haven't the :ellitem command + will eventually kill the economy due to price changes in the future, will be removing :ellitem + from the commands list, and having players adjust/fix prices, as how runescape did it in the beginning. ~ Armadyl Godsword has been powered up ~ Amazing Stablility removed add new methods for println statements due to lag + Admins only recieve those println statements so its faster to code. ~ Dark Bow Special Maxhit Increased "Watch Out" ~ August 26, 2009 ~ 100% - Purple Sweets - Perfect 95% - Friends list, Friends List isn't Saving but Ignores Is & and a few minor things to be fixed. ~ August 27, 2009 ~ 99% - Antiflooding, increased servers stability. Just need to test out more and its 100% ~ August 28, 2009 ~ 100% - Faster & More Stable Login 100% - Dual HD + LD 50% - Max item in bank fixed. ~ August 29, 2009 ~ 100% - Perfect Skill Menus 99% - Miasmic Barrage ~ - Msb (Magic Short Bow) Has been powered up a little bit before it hit bad. ~ - Admins have there original Combat levels ~ August 30, 2009 ~ 100% - I fixed an error i found while using Eclipse (an INTELLIGENCE, and a ID = id error.) 100% - Fixed Bank & Click Map DC Bug 90% - PVNPC is almost complete working on prayer, ranged, magic on npc. ~ Setup my Server for editing with Eclipse. ~ Fixed Online Friend Status ~ August 31, 2009 ~ 100% - Near Perfect Bank Notes 100% - Flawless Trading Free slots have been added. ~ Fixed Banking up more i finnaly got it near perfect just need tabs. ~ Fixed a few bank bugs ~ Trading is now near flawless just needs Remove Options ~ Trading Dups/Bugs with mini map are now fixed. ~ Few Item Dups Fixed ~ Bounty Hunter Class is in files but not enabled yet.. till i fix some stuff. ~ September 1, 2009 ~ 100% - Flood Protection for this server 3 connection per ip limit. ~ Following is added need to enable and will have to test ~ I have Collected all the G.E (Grand Exchange classes will have to intergrade with server later) ~ September 25, 2009 ~ 100% - Collect Interface 90% - Multiway Combat zones just need to fix a few bugs. 90% - Bank Count will in future make 496 same as rs max bank, and will need to make the + bank counter to update when you put an item in. This project has been abandoned by Freesunfury/Sunny++ of Rune-Server & *********
I don't mind if you use this as a base but give credits to "Sunny++" thank you have fun with this, and the leetchecker is in my files because i was going to add my own Grand Exchange using Runescapes Database to update my server items list with Runescapes and the Leetchecker is great for looking up item prices faster... so i thought it would help. Sunny++ did not create Leetchecker I don't have any pictures as i couldn't get the server running on my new laptop because my java got messed up but here you go.[/center]
